text: Non Stop Dancers were an Australian pop, funk band formed in 1984 by Kevin Jones on guitar and vocals, Karen Steains on bass guitar, Jane Stewart on keyboards, Brett Van Kriedt on drums, and his brother, Larry Van Kriedt on saxophone, guitar and vocals (ex-AC/DC, Eighty Eights). They released a full length album, Surprise Surprise, in December 1984. Their second single, "Shake this City", reached the Top 50 on the Kent Music Report Singes Chart. The group broke up in late 1986. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" border="1" ! Title !
